 opt

Documentation of meta :

lower_case = 0, UPPER CASE = 1

file :
o = opt prefix present
f = force prefix present

r = raw prefix present
t = template prefix present

h = headline present
p = optionnal after template

generated template :
o = opt prefex defined
f = force prefix defined
r = raw prefix defined
t = template prefix defined



Only one source file : txt00.00.00.
Then symlink to it.

format is as follow : txtof.rt.hp with of.rt.hp replaced by matching variable value.

of = 11 and rt = 11 are not allowed
